select s.*,m.nick_name FROM ( select r.id,r.member_id,r.address,r.newstime,device_name,d.pics,r.`status`,'1' as type from yjk_device_rent_out_info r LEFT JOIN yjk_device d on r.device_id=d.id UNION ALL select n.id,n.member_id,n.adress address,n.newstime,n.`name`,n.pics,n.`status`,'2' as type from yjk_device_rental_in_need_info n ) s LEFT JOIN yjk_member m on s.member_id=m.id where s.status != 3
and (s.device_name like '%${keyword}%' or s.address like '%${keyword}%' or m.nick_name like '%${keyword}%')
ORDER BY s.status desc,s.newstime DESC
